title: What are the political standpoints, views, philosophies, and paradigms of Slavoj Žižek? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is a quick analysis: He works in subjects including continental philosophy, political theory, cultural studies, psychoanalysis, film criticism, Marxism, Hegelianism and theology. In 1989 Žižek published his first English-language text, The Sublime Object of Ideology, in which he departed from traditional Marxist theory to develop a materialist conception of ideology that drew heavily on Lacanian psychoanalysis and Hegelian idealism.[4][5] Source: Slavoj Žižek - Wikipedia
Zizek is a Slovenian pseudo-philosopher idiot. He is the ONLY idiot coming from Eastern Europe. Forget about the rest.
